title: Fur For All
description: This novella has been expanded into the full-length novel, Drive Me Wild. In Manhattan, witches and werefolk have been giving each other the silent treatment for nearly 400 years, but now someone wants to renew diplomatic relations. When she's picked for the job, Tess can't believe it. She might be a witch, but she's hardly a miracle worker. In the end, tracking down Rafael De Santos, the head of the Council of Others, turns out to be the easy part. The hard part is falling in love with him. And the really hard part is convincing this werecat to stop tomcatting around. Luckily for Tess, some things are just meant to be.
author: Christine Warren
